00032 #pragma once
00033 
00034 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00035 #include <thrust/detail/type_traits.h>
00036 #include <thrust/iterator/detail/permutation_iterator_base.h>
00037 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_traits.h>
00038 
00039 namespace thrust
00040 {
00041 
00042 
00117 template <typename ElementIterator,
00118           typename IndexIterator>
00119   class permutation_iterator
00120     : public thrust::detail::permutation_iterator_base<
00121         ElementIterator,
00122         IndexIterator
00123       >::type
00124 {
00127   private:
00128     typedef typename detail::permutation_iterator_base<ElementIterator,IndexIterator>::type super_t;
00129 
00130     friend class experimental::iterator_core_access;
00134   public:
00138     __host__ __device__
00139     permutation_iterator()
00140       : m_element_iterator() {}
00141 
00149     __host__ __device__
00150     explicit permutation_iterator(ElementIterator x, IndexIterator y)
00151       : super_t(y), m_element_iterator(x) {}
00152 
00156     template<typename OtherElementIterator, typename OtherIndexIterator>
00157     __host__ __device__
00158     permutation_iterator(permutation_iterator<OtherElementIterator,OtherIndexIterator> const &r
00159     // XXX remove these guards when we have static_assert
00160     , typename detail::enable_if_convertible<OtherElementIterator, ElementIterator>::type* = 0
00161     , typename detail::enable_if_convertible<OtherIndexIterator, IndexIterator>::type* = 0
00162     )
00163       : super_t(r.base()), m_element_iterator(r.m_element_iterator)
00164     {}
00165 
00168   private:
00169     __host__ __device__
00170     typename super_t::reference dereference() const
00171     {
00172       return *(m_element_iterator + *this->base());
00173     }
00174 
00175     // make friends for the copy constructor
00176     template<typename,typename> friend class permutation_iterator;
00177 
00178     ElementIterator m_element_iterator;
00181 }; // end permutation_iterator
00182 
00183 
00194 template<typename ElementIterator, typename IndexIterator>
00195 __host__ __device__
00196 permutation_iterator<ElementIterator,IndexIterator> make_permutation_iterator(ElementIterator e, IndexIterator i)
00197 {
00198   return permutation_iterator<ElementIterator,IndexIterator>(e,i);
00199 }
00200 
00207 } // end thrust
